items.title: 4 charged with hate crimes for destroying LGBTQ+ pride flags, Atlanta police say
items.description: Atlanta police say they’re charging three men and a juvenile with hate crimes for pulling down LGBTQ+ pride flags and cutting them up

items.title: Wisconsin top court delivers win for environmentalists in 'forever chemicals' fight
items.description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court has delivered a victory for environmentalists in the battle over the regulation of “forever chemicals” known as PFAS

items.title: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed
items.description: The National Hurricane Center says Tropical Storm Andrea has formed in the Atlantic Ocean
